name: Endless Battle (itch)
description:
A 2D platformer shooter /mostly complete

made for Gameboy Jam 5

all assets were made/generated during the time limit

Retake the highly valued cargo ship carrying a prototype time machine

and destroy all the rebels.

use arrow keys to move and jump and

alt to shoot

notes:

tried my best but ran out of time for polishing

tips:

the rebel leader will time travel aka restart the game a couple of times with more health and troops every time you kill him.
